hero.description: A user-friendly platform that connects individuals in need of IT tech support with a worldwide network of locally accessible IT professionals.
hero.quote: In today's digital world, the need for quick and reliable IT support has never been greater.
hero.title:
Get professional
Tech Support now!

b2b.title: For Businesses and Individuals Seeking Reliable Tech Support
b2b.description: OurSupport simplifies IT Tech support for businesses and individuals by eliminating challenges like cultural differences, language barriers, time zones, scattered information, varying payment terms, and multiple currencies. We bring everything together on one platform, offering a seamless and standardised experience for everyone.
b2b.card2: Widely available across the entire globe

support.easyAccessDesc: Easy access for everyone, to local onsite or remote IT Tech support experts.
support.noHassleDesc: No hassle of searching for taking your hardware to a local dealer or store and waiting days for quotes.
support.noHiddenCostsDesc: All companies and private individuals can budget for IT support with confidence.
support.globalCommunityDesc: Access to a community of IT Tech experts with knowledge to resolve your technical issues efficiently.
support.platformDesc: Reliable and consistent standard of IT Tech support, reducing the risk of service disruptions.
support.title: Tech Support for everyone

access.title: Easy access to local IT Tech support experts!
access.description: Using OurSupport, businesses or individuals can get an IT expert on-site quickly, without having to negotiate pricing or wait days for a quote or an appointment.
access.serviceDesc: Onsite IT support provides a more personalized service, allowing the IT technician to get to know the customer's IT environment and thus meet their specific needs.
access.jargonDesc: You do not need to be IT literate to ask for IT help, OurSupport does not require that you know technical jargon.
access.pricingDesc: OurSupport works on a easy to understand pricing table. The customer will always be in control of how many hours are approved to work, thus avoiding surprise charges.
access.expertDesc: Connect with a local IT expert, that speaks the same language and shares the same country cultures
access.dataDesc: With onsite support, customers can ensure that their data or pictures by not having to leave your PC unattended by you at a local repair store.

steps.title: Three steps approach for everyone
steps.step1Description: If you are a customer needing support or an IT technician looking to earn extra income, use the links above to download the OurSupport mobile application onto your mobile phone.
steps.step2Title: Register and login on the OurSupport app
steps.step2Description: After the app installation, register on the OurSupport mobile application as either a customer or IT technician, if your represent a company or as an individual capacity.
steps.step3Title: Ready to request IT help or receive work
steps.step3Description: Once you have registered and successfully verified your account, you can now request or accept IT support work

stepsMobile.step2Title: Register and login on the OurSupport app

stepsMobile.step3Title: Ready to request IT help or receive work
stepsMobile.step3Description: Once you have registered and successfully verified your account, you can now request or accept IT support work

team.title: One team across many borders
team.description: Our ever growing community of IT experts are up to date with the latest technologies and available to support you around the world.

intouch.title: Get in touch
intouch.description: If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us, and we will do our best to respond as quickly as possible.
intouch.messagePlaceholder: Hi! I would like to know...
